mapper.select: select a.*, b.file_path from form a inner join animal b on a.animal_id = b.num order by a.form_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into form (animal_id, name, phone, address, live, family, experience1, experience2, state) values (#{animalId}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{live}, #{family}, #{experience1}, #{experience2}, '심사중')
